official_title: Use of Low Cost Prostheses to Improve Upper Extremity Function in Children With Cerebral Palsy
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis: cerebral palsy
* 4-17 years old
* MACS levels III - V
* Active movement of wrist or elbow
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 4 Years
Must have maximum age of 17 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* MACS levels I, II
* Botox or orthopedic surgery in past 6 months
* Severe contractures
* Lack of voluntary arm motion
